title: PAX is Going Online - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.16.20
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about PAX Australia and PAX West's cancellation along with expectations for DC FanDome.   

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:08:52 - Housekeeping
EA Play is happening Thursday at 4pm pt and we’ll be reacting live to it right here on twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
The Roper Report   -
00:11:00 -  You’ll have to wait till August for WB game announcements - Stephany Nunneley @ VG247
00:20:05 - Nintendo shadow-dropped a free jump rope game - Jon Porter @ The Verge
00:22:50 - A new Kingdom Hearts game has been announced! - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:26:53 - That Itch.io Bundle raised $8.1m - Mathew Handrahan @ GiBiz
00:31:35 - PAX Australia has been cancelled - Matthew Handrahan @ GiBiz
00:35:45 - Pokemon news is coming tomorrow - @Pokemon Twitter
00:42:00 - Out today
00:42:20 -  Ad
 Reader mail   -
00:45:20 - Do you believe Xbox is held to higher standard by the gaming community than Playstation based on how this generation has gone? - Michael S
00:57:24 - Squad Up:Penultimate Conquest(Activision) Sleepertechdub
00:57:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Gary
